onNmeaReceived(long,java.lang.String).history: Added in API level 5 Deprecated in API level 24
onNmeaReceived(long,java.lang.String).FullName: public abstract void onNmeaReceived (long timestamp, String nmea)

onNmeaReceived(long, java.lang.String).FullName: public abstract void onNmeaReceived (long timestamp, String nmea)

ClassDesc: use @B_android#location#OnNmeaMessageListener_E@ instead. Used for receiving NMEA sentences from the GPS. NMEA 0183 is a standard for communicating with marine electronic devices and is a common method for receiving data from a GPS, typically over a serial port. See @B_android#location#LocationManager#addNmeaListener_E@ to receive NMEA data from the GPS engine.
